mapper.insert: insert into Refund (Drop_Id, Back_Id, Suspende_Id, Student_Id, Classes_Id, Course_Id, DetailCourse_Id,RefundType, Drop_Money, AddName, AddTime) values (#{dropId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{backId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{suspendeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{studentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{classesId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{courseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{detailcourseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{refundtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dropMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{addname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select , from Refund r inner join Student stu on stu.Student_Id=r.Student_Id order by AddTime desc
